InstalledItem.Name: M5A Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Laser Cannon
Size: 3

When energy autocannons are designed, Behring's M5A provides the standard to which they are measured against, owing to its long range of engagement and low damage fallout.

InstalledItem.Name: Sure Grip Tractor
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Greycat Industrial
Item Type: Tractor Beam

Greycat’s latest addition to their field-tested tractor beam line is a dependable addition to their catalog. Aside from a more efficient pull/draw ratio, the latest model does little to advance from the previous models. The Sure Grip has settings to target and extract everything from asteroid fragments to drifting crewmen, backed by Greycat’s certified Soft-Touch® guarantee.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-212 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 2
Missiles: 1xS2

Behring’s MSD-212 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 2 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of one S2 missile.

InstalledItem.Name: Tempest II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 2

The Tempest was designed with nothing but annihilation in mind. Utilizing FireStorm Kinetics' targeting technology, this proximity missile locks onto a target's cross section to draw conflicts to a swift conclusion.

InstalledItem.Name: Slipstream
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Tyler Design & Tech
Size: 1
Grade: A
Class: Stealth

Tyler Design & Tech uses an expensive alloy on its Slipstream power plant to reduce its overall emissions. This design choice is key to making this small power plant’s detectable signature one of the lowest on the market.

Pilots looking to keep their IR signature low rely on Tyler Design & Tech. As an entry level cooler, the HeatSafe not only limits emissions, it is built with Tyler’s satisfaction guarantee.

The Goliath was designed to be more durable than other quantum drives in its class. That’s made it a staple of industrial ship since Humanity first started to explore the stars.
